entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 30 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 14.
